com.example.zoomwroom.database

类 MyDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.zoomwroom.database.MyDataBase

  • public class MyDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class that retrieves data from or update data to firebase
    作者:
    Siyuan Liu

      • getInstance

        public static MyDataBase getInstance()

      • addRequest

        public java.lang.String addRequest(DriveRequest driveRequest)
        This function adds the request to data base
        参数:
        driveRequest - a request object
        返回:
        requestID return the id of request

      • getDriverRequest

        public java.util.ArrayList<DriveRequest> getDriverRequest(java.lang.String driverID)
        This function get an array of requests
        参数:
        driverID - string of driverID
        返回:
        driveRequests an array of drive requests related to this driver

      • getDriveRequestsByDriverIDAndStatus

        public java.util.ArrayList<DriveRequest> getDriveRequestsByDriverIDAndStatus(java.lang.String driverID,
                                                                             int status)
        Returns an arraylist of DriveRequests for a specific driverID and status of the request
        参数:
        driverID - Driver's unique id (their email address)
        status - status of the DriveRequests to be provided
        返回:
        Arraylist of DriveRequests with the specific status for that Driver

      • updateRequest

        public void updateRequest(DriveRequest driveRequest)
        This function adds the request to data base
        参数:
        driveRequest - a request object

      • getCurrentRequest

        public DriveRequest getCurrentRequest(java.lang.String userID,
                                      java.lang.String dataType)
        This function returns the current active request of a user
        参数:
        userID - user ID
        dataType - user type(riderID or driverID)
        返回:
        return the current request

      • getOpenRequests

        public java.util.ArrayList<DriveRequest> getOpenRequests()
        Returns open request that have their status as PENDING
        返回:
        Arraylist of drive requests that have status pending and have not been picked by a driver

      • isUserNameUnique

        public java.lang.Boolean isUserNameUnique(java.lang.String userName)
        checks if the username is unique. If it is unique and no other user with that username exists returns true, otherwise returns false.
        参数:
        userName - username to check for uniqueness
        返回:
        boolean value indicating if the username is unique or not

      • addQRBucks

        public void addQRBucks(QRBucks buck)
        Add QRBucks instance to firestore database. This should be called when scanning the QRCode.
        参数:
        buck - instance of QRBucks to add to the database.

      • getQRBuckByDriveID

        public QRBucks getQRBuckByDriveID(java.lang.String driveRequestID)
        Returns a single QRBuck by the driveID it is associated to.
        参数:
        driveRequestID - driveRequestID to look up the associated QRBuck instance for
        返回:
        QRBuck instance associated to the DriveRequest

      • getQRBucksByDriverID

        public java.util.ArrayList<QRBucks> getQRBucksByDriverID(java.lang.String driverID)
        May need to change status to Concluded once that is implemented.
        参数:
        driverID -
        返回:
